member.name: IAppxManifestPackageDependency.GetMinVersion
member.summary: Gets the minimum version of the package on which the current package has a dependency.
member.param: The minimum version of the package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageDependency.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the package on which the current package has a dependency.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageDependency.GetPublisher
member.summary: Gets the name of the publisher that produced the package on which the current package depends.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageDependency
member.summary: Describes the dependency of one package on another package.
